  • VirtualBox in terminal on osx

    07 Sep 2014
    We all have the experience that install a Linux in VM on osx. But every time we want to do something in Linux, we have to open a VM window. Even if we install a Linux without GUI, a VM window with command-line interface is also necessary. Why not simply turn on the virtual Linux on Terminal in OS X and connect to it with ssh? Here I'll tell you the way to do so.
